attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop non direct debit charges on household bills; 
for us in retirement these charges are disgusting!   we pay online with visacard on time!  we have the right to chose how we pay a bill;  why should we be charged more for being good customers?? if u are paying these charges too, help me and anyone else who are penalized by this unreasonable charge!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
